newsitem.title: USA: CBOT rice closes narrowly mixed and rangebound.
newsitem.headline: CBOT rice closes narrowly mixed and rangebound.

text.p: CBOT rice futures closed narrowly mixed and the market remained rangebound as it absorbed bullish input from slow farmer selling and a mild recovery in Asian cash market values, traders said.
The market this week also took note of flooding in southern India, which led to talk of a short-term rice shortfall in that region.
But futures trading remained choppy with Tuesday's volume estimated by the CBOT at 300 contracts, below the 482 contracts traded Monday.
Rice futures closed one cent per cwt higher to one cent lower, with January down one cent at $10.68 per cwt.
